title: Celebrities over track action? Why the Singapore GP was better than it looked on TV
summary: As his radio messages were highlighted again, Fernando Alonso told F1 after the Singapore GP to focus on improving its TV coverage instead - and judging by what fans didn't see, he might have a point

qa_pairs.question: Which driver emphasized the need for improved TV coverage after the Singapore GP?
What significant event is referred to in the context of the Singapore GP?
What does the discussion imply about the fan experience during the Singapore GP?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Fans may have missed important on-track action.
wrong_options: The race was heavily dominated by one driver.
